Imdb actually has hardcore porn (see: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000110/)

This is not hardcore.  It's marginally soft-core porn by today's standards, and it's gotten some pretty noteworthy mainstream attention (bigger Hong Kong opening day gross than Avatar; positive reviews in the LA Times and Variety).  It's fair to post this under movies and not porn.
